mapper.select: select (select name from member where member.id = writer ) name , to_char(writedate, 'rrrr/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') writedate, b.* from board_comment b where pid = #{pid} order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment( writer, content, pid ) values ( #{writer}, #{content}, #{pid} )
